website_summaries.verdict: Solves the annoying “puff” of powder one gets when opening detergent bags, by placing it in single-use packets that dissolve in the wash.
pros: Single-use packets are easy to toss into the washing machine, and they dissolve completely
Contains no harsh chemicals, brighteners, or fragrances that can irritate skin
Freshens laundry nicely without leaving any odor behind
cons: If handled roughly, packets may leak a bit

customer_reviews.title: I think Charlie's Soap is brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: I think Charlie's Soap is brilliant. I wash my silk sheets in Charlie's Soap and they've lasted five years. Also, because I only use Charlie's Soap in my front loading washer, I don't have to do the tub clean cycle. Nor do I have to use fabric softener or dryer sheets. These laundry packets are convenient, too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ranney

customer_reviews.title: My favorite laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I purchased the packets so I could conveniently carry some laundry detergent with me on vacation. I didn't experience any issues with the packets. They dissolved completely in the wash and didn't leave any type of residue on clothes or in the washing machine. While I prefer to use the loose powder at home, the packets are excellent for taking with you when traveling. This detergent is extremely gentle and does a wonderful job at cleaning. I use it for all of my laundry including delicates, bedding, and towels.
customer_reviews.author: CaniacGirl

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this detergent after the positive reviews... But after using this for 2 days (clothes and bedsheets) my husband couldn't sleep or wearanything washed with this detergent without having an allergic reaction. I have no idea what in this product caused his reaction but i went back and rewashed everything in our previous detergent (all free + clear) and guess what?! ZERO issues!! I hate it bc i was only able to use 4 packets of the 30 and I'm pretty sure I cannot return the opened bag. Guess we'll be sticking with our regular detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We bought these For our two week European vacation so we could bring fewer clothes. They were just fine for going through airport security. The soap worked well, but we did discover that the paper leaves behind white fuzz on dark colored clothes. I started just emptying the pouches directly in the washer and disposing of the paper pouches.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson Cakes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wash off the stains really
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I use naturals detergents for several years. I always try new brands to find thee best fit. This one is fragrance free whcih is great, it is very convenient packaging with single packs, however it only washes off very simple stains and doesn't clean heavier stains. I take the clothes out just feeling fresh but doesn't look like it has been washed at all as they stains ar there. I am washing only adult clothing with regular types of stains any adult may have.
customer_reviews.author: Free bird

customer_reviews.title: 6 years and still going strong

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 stars because it isn't actually Natural or Safe ...

However, I bought this for travel so I won't be too picky this time since it does its job.

I haven’t really noticed a scent which is fine by me. Follow me on insta @Partial_Marshall. I was NOT compensated for this review.

customer_reviews.text: Love Charlie's soap (and Booster and Bleach) but find the packaging difficult to manage. Difficult for elderly/arthritic hands to open and scoop so I do prefer the packets. I put Charlie's powders in plastic jars with screw tops. I leave the lid partially unscrewed to avoid a fight to open each time. So laundry packets are top drawer with me.
customer_reviews.author: Clarity Driven

customer_reviews.title: I used to use TIDE pods, Charlies Soap is the only laundry detergent that I will use now.
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions. The first several times you use Charlie's Soap - Unscented Powdered Laundry Packets 30 Count, do a long SOAK in the wash cycle. I did not soak clothes in the bucket as was suggested on the website. Instead, every time I do the laundry I pause the washing machine for an hour after it fills to let the clothes soak. As explained on the website, It takes several washes with the soak, to start breaking down the softeners, scents, etc deposited from other laundry detergents. I don't have to worry any more about my clothes starting to smell during the day when I perspire.
customer_reviews.author: snowy

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this soap 3 times now and I really like it. My top load washer doesn't stink anymore, the clothes come out smelling great and very clean. Tide pods stick together and you have a mess. With these you don't have that problem. I've used Tide since the beginning of time but I will definitely change over to this product

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry product and Made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: My clothes are just as clean as with products that are not eco-friendly. We deal with very hard water in FL. I have tried many different products over the 7 years we've lived here, including bleach, to get the gray out of my whites to no avail. I had hoped this would be the charm, but my whites are still gray. They aren't getting any grayer. That said, I will continue to use this product because it is eco-friendly and Made in the USA!

They end up smelling fresh and clean somehow. Will purchase again!

The detergent has a light pleasant clean smell but there are no added scents. There was never any soapy residue and the suds were kept to a minimum. Rinsed our easily. Won’t go traveling again without packing these!

customer_reviews.title: Clean laundry, clean machine
customer_reviews.text: This detergent -- powdered, small packaged, or liquid -- is fabulous. Just a small quantity is needed for a thorough and clean smelling load of laundry. Because a little goes a long way, it is very cost effective. Charlie's has spoiled me!

customer_reviews.title: best soap I've used and package is very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful soap and very convenient packaging. I've been using it 5 years now and it's wonderful. My clothes are better looking, softer, less wrinkled, and I hardly have any dryer lint now. It's unreal. It does not break my fabrics down and my clothes stay nice looking longer then when I used other brands. we wash everything in Charlies soap laundry powder, work uniforms, dress items, everyday clothes, workout clothes, delicates. This packaging is nice. I tossed the whole little packet in and it completely dissolved and worked great. I'm using a top loading HE machine. I was on cool, not cold. I have decent water so no issues there.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, my favorite laundry soap!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite laundry soap! I love that it gets out all the stains it says it does (urine, grease, wine, grass, vomit), and is so convenient to carry while traveling.

product_meta.title: Charlie’s Soap – Fragrance Free Powdered Laundry Detergent Packets – 30 Pods (1 Pack)…
product_meta.description: Size:30 Count (Pack of 1)You won’t trade convenience for clean when you toss a single-dose Laundry Powder Packet in the wash tub. There’s no clumsy measuring or spills. Each biodegradable packet dissolves quickly in water, not in your hands. And an important safety tip: the packet does not look like candy that might tempt a child. Its non-toxic formula keeps families safe, as its hypoallergenic formula keeps clothes soft. Your wash rinses clean, as the septic-safe formula keeps your HE washing machine clean and running smoothly.
feature_bullets: ONE PACKET, ONE WASH - No clumsy measuring and no spills are needed for clean, soft, fresh smelling laundry
SAFE AND EFFECTIVE - Cleans all fabric types and helps prevent color fading, keeping your clothes looking brand new
HYPOALLERGENIC – Fragrance-free formula ideal for those with sensitive skin, containing no brighteners, perfumes, or fillers
BIODEGRADABLE - Non-toxic packets are made from natural ingredients and are safe for the environment
SEPTIC SAFE - Dissolves quickly in water and rinses clean while keeping HE machines clean. Packets do not look like candy
